Text:
No this is not a Cider port :)

Cutscenes work perfectly

OMG yesterday I was like "I'd like to play that old game Heretic, but I don't use Windows any more." and on the same day I remembered it, a Mac port comes out.

Thanks

You are welcome :)
Even though this is Heretic 2.
I have also ported Heretic 1, but not yet uploaded it.
A native port of Heretic 2 for Mac:  http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5471145/
How you maked it? Did you have a Heretic II Source Code?
